title: Find the Githyanki Creche
content:
hy you have come. You will get the following dialogue choices.

Allow Lae'zel to answer. I'm on your side! Captain Voss sent me to find an item for you. I was infected by an illithid. I have proof that they are invading. We need your help. [INTIMIDATION] Let me pass. Fighting me will end badly for you. [PERSUASION] You Githyanki hate illithid. I have proof that they're invading. We need your help. Attack.

Choosing dialogue 1 will gain Lae'zel's approval and Shadowheart's disapproval. Lae'zel wi
